Author: amy-shakes
Text: when I’m wearing sweatpants and a hoodie it can add 5 to 6 pounds and as well when I go to the bathroom I drink a lot of water so I’ll usually lose 2 pounds if I’ve been consistently drinking water but I’ve been constipated lately from restricting but depending on the amount I would estimate 2 pounds these numbers are from what I’ve experienced so it could definitely be different for a lot of other people
